definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

sentences.english: Position the hose at a downspout drain to discharge then let go of the crimp.
sentences.chinese: 位置处于降排水软管燃放然后放过了卷曲。

sentences.english: P9 had a coiled-coil region; all five proteins have no signal peptides.
sentences.chinese: P9蛋白有一个螺旋卷曲区域，五个蛋白均无信号肽。

sentences.english: The outer coat is wavy or curly, but never silky.
sentences.chinese: 外层披毛为波浪状或卷曲，但不能呈丝状。

sentences.english: She was twirling her hair absentmindedly.
sentences.chinese: 她心不在焉地卷曲自己的头发。

sentences.english: Crimp connections are not acceptable for any brush attachment.
sentences.chinese: 不允许有冷焊焊缝，卷曲的接头不允许使用。

sentences.english: Straps to be secured with crimped steel seals.
sentences.chinese: 钢带应使用卷曲钢密封以确保安全。

sentences.english: Straighten curly hair with a flat iron for a sleek new look.
sentences.chinese: 卷曲的头发拉直与扁铁的时尚新面貌。

sentences.english: Its crisp-textured coat, a combination of hard and soft hairs, may be pepper- or mustard-coloured.
sentences.chinese: 身体毛发卷曲，软硬杂生，呈胡椒色或芥末色。

sentences.english: Then it curls its trunk under, sticks the tip of its trunk into its mouth, and blows.
sentences.chinese: 然后象鼻向下卷曲，鼻子的末端插入嘴里，吹气。

sentences.english: The tail is medium to long, well feathered, set high and carried over the back.
sentences.chinese: 尾部中长，带羽状附毛，向上卷曲于背部。

sentences.english: His skin was olive-colored and had curly, medium-length brown hair.
sentences.chinese: 他的橄榄色皮肤颜色和卷曲，中等长度的棕色头发。

sentences.english: The cutting edge roundness can make chip curling radii larger.
sentences.chinese: 切削刃钝圆一般能使切屑卷曲半径增大。

sentences.english: As he coiled slowly neath his chair.
sentences.chinese: 当他慢慢尼思卷曲他的椅子。

sentences.english: Some cells brim crimped and some cell's membrane appeared pinholes.
sentences.chinese: 有些细胞边缘卷曲及细胞膜破裂出现不规则小孔。

sentences.english: A fancy twist or curl, such as a flourish made with a pen.
sentences.chinese: 花饰，旋曲一种精致的弯曲或卷曲，如用钢笔写成的。

sentences.english: A sheep has a thick woolly coat.
sentences.chinese: 绵羊有一层卷曲柔软的厚毛。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
